name: mind-blown
effect: Inflicts damage, and the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP, rounded up. The user still takes damage if the move is blocked by Protect or Substitute, misses, or if the target has Flash Fire.

flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user attacks everything around it by causing its
own head to explode. This also damages the user.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user attacks everything around it by causing its
own head to explode. This also damages the user.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:

own head to explode. This also damages the user.
